title: Riocasino
author: Riocasino
created_time: December 17, 2022, 01:37:55 PMLast edit: December 17, 2022, 01:56:36 PM by Riocasino
content: I am aboyt to double my money .Here proof that i really bet and and not only talkhttps://www.loom.com/share/c9521aefcc6f4efdb7a797fd2fc25700This guy chared going to win 100% and ill double my money.This is my prediction and i am better in this than anyone else.At the end of the  day ill buy me gift - Inew macbook air 2022- new clothes-bottle of chamlainge.Stay tuned ll post photo when i buy new macbook air in 24 hours with with the winnings. + a meal with the most expensive resuturant.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: Quote1.91  vs  1.90you can't tell who could win though by just the odds but that's the odds. but i saw same predictions so you are not the only who is seeing the same possibility. but Strickland has more experienced, he lost against periera but that's because its periera. he's a bad ass who beats champions.i'm more surprise with what you plan to buy. many clothes and champagne lol why not just beer, rum or whiskey.

I can tell i am analysiy expert on mma.  The odds you see on bookies re wrong.Im going to celibrate today.Watch out.  Not every day i can predict fights but when i do i win.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Is that you Fishy001? He was last active here last November 15 while you created your account and start posting same bet brag type thread during November 16. There’s a similarities on the way you want to brag your own bet and encourage everyone to follow your lead. There’s no need to update us about your bet status because no one is asking for you to update us here. Just enjoy your profit on your own mate.

comments.author: ufaiz50
comments.body: I see that the other thread you have started has been now locked. I guess that did not really went well, not really welcomed by the many users here. Can’t blame them tho, it’s really hard to just believe without doubts any hearsay. But now, you got my attention and I’ll be looking out if you could really stand by your claims and make your predictions into reality. Good luck!

comments.body: You all doubt me every single of you doubt me. Doubt me now  I warn you yesterday to put all your money on charedhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5428793.msg61445109#msg61445109

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Not everyone doubted you, it's all in your brain.   The odds are almost equal so many of us may have ended up betting the same as you did.Well, if you think you are good at analyzing MMA fights then you could share it here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5139347.0 Instead of scattering a new thread for every bet for every game.There is good analysis being shared in that thread and maybe you could be part of it so that we could increase our chances to win against the house.Congratulations on your win. Wishing you more profits.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on December 17, 2022, 04:09:12 PMQuote from: Riocasino on December 17, 2022, 02:06:27 PMQuote from: AbuBhakar on December 17, 2022, 02:01:56 PM-snip--snip--snip-I knew right away this was the same guy as soon as I started reading this thread, literally the same format and way of posting.I knew he would not stay off this place very long. Unfortunately, you may not have many chances to copy his bets or take public advice from him, since I believe he is technically ban-evading (I don't know the duration of his previous ban, so I could be wrong).It is just matter of time untill someone reports him or something. Anyways, enjoy your money.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on December 18, 2022, 03:00:28 AMYou all doubt me every single of you doubt me. Doubt me now  I warn you yesterday to put all your money on charedhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5428793.msg61445109#msg61445109It’s normal that everyone will doubted you because you are a newbie and also the way you construct your prediction thread looks like you are just trolling rather giving a clear analysis on your pick. You have a time to tell here about you going rich and buying things on your win while you can’t provide data that will support your picks rather trusting you alone which is very hard to do given with your current status.Congratulations in your win. Even we doubted you or not that bet slip is yours and not ours. So we can’t push ourselves to bet on your pick if didn’t want it to. I think you can gain follower now on your next pick since you already prove some validity on your preferred picks. Just be consistent and less talk on useless things that off topic to your bets.

comments.author: BitcoinAccepted
comments.body: Still quite a lot of money to bet on it. Those kinds of games can also go completely wrong. wouldn't it have been a better idea to spread your risk more with bets? Unless you have a bank account of 100k, then you don't feel that 3.5k so much of course. There is currently little attention for side events, but not surprising since the final of football between France and Argentina is still in full swing. Soon you might be able to see if you can bet on Rico Verhoeven.

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: Despite your confidence, it must have been a hard watch. I've never in my life wanted to bet that much, but I know when a big bet is coming in, and the fights are close. Which this fight, judging by the highlights was very close to judge. Certainly wasn't the most dominant win ever. Should jump on over into the UFC fight prediction thread. We could do with some luck, especially if you can provide some explanation on why you think a fighters going to win. Quote from: BitcoinAccepted on December 18, 2022, 05:26:41 PMStill quite a lot of money to bet on it. Those kinds of games can also go completely wrong. wouldn't it have been a better idea to spread your risk more with bets? Since they won, no .

comments.author: jostorres
comments.body: What a fight it was and I had it for Strickland because I felt he did more damage and had clearly more head strikes but the judges as always are unpredictable and gave the split decision to Cannonier who I really like though so I didn't mind too much.My bet was over rounds and I won that comfortably. One thing I want to tell you guys and not promoting stake but they offer refunds on split decision UFC losses so if you had a bet on Strickland you basically get refunded. As a fellow gambler telling you the offers I know that may help you get more value from the same bet plus they have enhanced odds on UFC.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on December 17, 2022, 01:37:55 PMStay tuned ll post photo when i buy new macbook air in 24 hours with with the winnings. + a meal with the most expensive resuturant.Congratulations in advance, since you are so sure that you double your money,But right now, I am guessing that maybe things later did not workout the way you had planed it, which is why you have not posted your new Mac book.All I can say is that, gambling is never predictable, any thing can happen at any time, it doesn't matter how close you are to winning, if it's not your lucky day, the game would still crash leaving one at a big loss.
